USE master

IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM master.sys.databases WHERE name='SourceDB')
    DROP DATABASE SourceDB

CREATE DATABASE [SourceDB]

USE SourceDB

IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sys.tables WHERE name='NEO_tb') 
    DROP TABLE dbo.NEO_tb;

--Create table NEO( i int);

WITH Ten(N) AS 
(
    SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL 
    SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL 
    SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1
)   
SELECT
    id = CONVERT(integer, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY T10.N))
    , (CAST(RAND(CHECKSUM(NEWID()))*3 as int) +1)*100 as MId
INTO dbo.NEO_tb 
FROM Ten AS T10
CROSS JOIN Ten T100
CROSS JOIN Ten T1000
CROSS JOIN Ten T10000
CROSS JOIN Ten T100000
CROSS JOIN Ten T1000000;

CREATE CLUSTERED INDEX CIX_id ON dbo.NEO_tb (id);


DECLARE @DateStart DATETIME = '2022-01-01 07:00:00'

SELECT

    A.Mid
    --, (CAST(RAND(CHECKSUM(NEWID()))*3 as int) +1)*100 as id
    , CASE 
        WHEN A.MId=100 THEN 400 
        WHEN A.MId=200 THEN 500
        WHEN A.MId=300 THEN 600 
        ELSE 0
     END as ctype
    , CASE 
        WHEN A.MId=100 THEN CAST(RAND(CHECKSUM(NEWID()))*10.8 as real) +15 
        WHEN A.MId=200 THEN CAST(RAND(CHECKSUM(NEWID()))*10.8 as real) +5 
        WHEN A.MId=300 THEN CAST(RAND(CHECKSUM(NEWID()))*10.1 as real) +2 
        ELSE 0
     END as cvalue
    , DATEADD(SECOND, id, @DateStart) as tstamp INTO source_tb
FROM NEO_tb AS A 

IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sys.tables WHERE name='lookupvalues_tb') 
    DROP TABLE dbo.lookupvalues_tb;

CREATE TABLE lookupvalues_tb
(
    lid int IDENTITY(1,1),
    CodeId int,
    CodeName varchar(50),
    CodeType varchar(50),
